q3.vigenere

Class VigenereCipher

  • java.lang.Object
    • q3.vigenere.VigenereCipher

  • public class VigenereCipher
extends java.lang.Object
    Cipher class that allows encryption and decryption of strings using the Vigenere method. Messages are encrypted and decrypted through a vigenere cipher object. Manual encryption and decryption is facilitated by printing the table.
    Version:
    1.0, 2016-04-02
    Author:
    Damien Murphy

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • testVigenere

        public void testVigenere()
        Test method by: Generating and printing Vigenere Table, Generating the key using the keyword, Encrypting a message (plain text), Decrypting the cipher text. Printing the table, key, message, ciphertext & decrypted ciphertext.

      • generateVigenereTable

        public static void generateVigenereTable()
        Generates the Vigenere Table

      • generateKey

        public java.lang.String generateKey(java.lang.String keyword,
                           int keyLength)
        Generates a key of the specified length using the keyword. Checks desired keylength is a positive number. Any punctuation in the keyword is removed. Keyword is transformed to uppercase.
        Parameters:
        keyLength - The number of characters in the key.
        keyword - The keyword used to generate the key
        Returns:
        The key for use in encrypting a message whose length matches the key length.

      • encrypt

        public java.lang.String encrypt(java.lang.String key,
                       java.lang.String plainText)
        Encrypts plain text (message text) with the key using the Vigenere Table.
        Parameters:
        plainText - The plain text (message text) to be encrypted
        key - The key under which the plain text is encrypted
        Returns:
        The cipher text created by encrypting the plaintext under the generated key.

      • decrypt

        public java.lang.String decrypt(java.lang.String key,
                       java.lang.String cipherText)
        Decrypts cipher text under the key using the Vigenere Table.
        Parameters:
        key - The key under which the cipher text is decrypted
        cipherText - The cipher text to be decrypted.
        Returns:
        The plain text obtained by decrypting the cipher text under the generated key.

      • printVigenereTable

        public void printVigenereTable()
        Prints the vigenere table

      • printKey

        public void printKey(java.lang.String key)
        Print the key.
        Parameters:
        key - The key used for encryption and decryption.

      • printMessage

        public void printMessage(java.lang.String plainText)
        Print the plain text (message text).
        Parameters:
        plainText - The plain text (message text).

      • printCipher

        public void printCipher(java.lang.String cipherText)
        Print the cipher text.
        Parameters:
        cipherText - The encrypted message.

      • shiftChar

        static char shiftChar(char ch,
             int shift)
        Shifts char value within char range by a specified number of characters
        Parameters:
        ch - char to shift
        shift - number of characters to amount to shift char by
        Returns:
        shifted char
